tasks.notes: Provides instructions for a task. Records time. Can pause and resume. Has a basic success condition.
tasks.name: Basic task intructions

model.instructions: Go to google and find an image that you like

tasks.notes: Blocks the entire screen to give the participant a message.
tasks.name: Message screen

tasks.notes: Blocks the entire screen to show the participant a Youtube video.
tasks.name: Youtube video

tasks.notes: A sequence of simple questions, to elicit very short answers.
tasks.name: Simple questionaire

model.introduction: Answer these questions succinctly - like if they were tweets
model.questions:
How old are you?
How many hours a day do you spend in front of your device?
